posts.post_content:
This is perfect with Evolve.  
  
Put it on a Cloudfin Raptor until it get's 7 or 8 +1/+1 counters, then move it to another Evolve creature.  
  
On a Gyre Sage, the +1/+1 counters would still count towards the mana provided, even if it has 0 Power.

posts.post_content: This is an exceptionally good card in limited. Anyone that says otherwise hasn't managed to get one in play. It's really good for Simic so you can trigger Evolve on your own guys, or it's really good just as a defensive spell if you're Dimir so you can keep swinging away with your unblockable guys without fear of retalation. Drawing two of these more or less won me the pre-release event in my area.
posts.html:

It's really good for Simic so you can trigger Evolve on your own guys, or it's really good just as a defensive spell if you're Dimir so you can keep swinging away with your unblockable guys without fear of retalation. Drawing two of these more or less won me the pre-release event in my area.
